pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scrape Text Data from LIHKG // The goal of 'LIHKGr' is to scrape text data from LIHKG (https://lihkg.com/), the Hong Kong version of Reddit. LIHKG is currently protected by Google's 'reCAPTCHA', this package currently builds on 'RSelenium' and adopts a semi-manual approach to bypass it.
